title: Crude oil imports to Canada by region of origin 2018
summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Imports in million metric tons for 9 number of Countrys.
Country Total has the highest Imports in million metric tons and Russia has the lowest Imports in million metric tons.
The highest Country Total has 28.9 more Imports in million metric tons than the lowest Country Russia.

Country Total has the highest Imports in million metric tons and Russia has the lowest Imports in million metric tons.

max_summary: This is a bar chart representing Country in the x axis and Imports in million metric tons in the y axis.
Country Total has the highest Imports in million metric tons and Russia has the lowest Imports in million metric tons.
The Imports in million metric tons of Country Russia is 145.5% smaller than the maximum value at Total.
Imports in million metric tons at Country Total is 29.1 , second place is United States at 18.8, and thirdly is Saudi Arabia at 5.6.
Country West Africa, and CIS (excluding Russia) have a similar Imports in million metric tons that is 1.1.
The highest value 29.1 at Total is almost 4.51 times larger than the average value 6.46.
